newsitem.title: POLAND: Komunalny bank to boost conv bond issue.
newsitem.headline: Komunalny bank to boost conv bond issue.

text.p: Polish Bank Komunalny SA wants to increase its upcoming convertible two-year bond issue to 82.7 million zlotys from the earlier planned 50 million zlotys, the bank said on Wednesday.
The bonds, of 1,000 zlotys each, would be subject to approval by the general shareholders' meeting on April 21.
The bank plans to issue 3.06 million new shares for the bonds. @
The bonds' conversion price would be at least 23 zlotys plus 15 percent. If unconverted, the bonds would carry six-percent interest. -- Warsaw Newsroom +48 22 653 9700
